keywords.name: organizations
keywords.value: CHURCHES OF CHRIST IN AMER, FED COUNCIL OF

headline.main: CHURCHES ASSURED ON TAYLOR STATUS; Roosevelt, in Letter to Head of Federal Council, Denies Formal Vatican Link ENVOY'S TITLE EXPLAINED Rank Equal to Ambassador Given for Social Purposes, President Asserts

lead_paragraph: Assurances from President Roosevelt that the appointment of Myron C. Taylor as his personal representative to cooperate with the Vatican for world peace "does not constitute the inauguration of formal diplomatic relations with the Vatican" were made public yesterday by the Rev. Dr. George A. Euttrick, president of the Federal Council of the Churches of Christ in America.
